articles.title: PS5’s console covers make it feel more like my own - The Verge
articles.description: Sony has released PS5 console covers in black and red, with more colors on the way, costing $54.99 for each set. They’re relatively simple to install, and that added dash of color might make the PS5 blend in better at home.
